verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:28
verses.text: If a man find a damsel that is a virgin, which is not betrothed, and lay hold on her, and lie with her, and they be found;

verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:29
verses.text: Then the man that lay with her shall give unto the damsel’s father fifty shekels of silver, and she shall be his wife; because he hath humbled her, he may not put her away all his days.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:30
verses.text: A man shall not take his father’s wife, nor discover his father’s skirt.
